name: Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park
description: A memorial park dedicated to Ghana's first president, featuring his mausoleum and museum showcasing his life and achievements.

name: Labadi Beach
description: One of Accra's most popular beaches with beautiful white sands, vibrant atmosphere, and local food vendors.

name: Jamestown Lighthouse
description: Historic lighthouse offering panoramic views of Jamestown fishing harbor and the Atlantic Ocean.

name: National Museum of Ghana
description: Ghana's largest museum showcasing the country's cultural heritage, archaeology, and art from prehistoric times to present.

name: Makola Market
description: Vibrant open-air market offering everything from fresh produce to textiles, known for its bustling atmosphere.

name: Independence Square
description: Large public square built to commemorate Ghana's independence, featuring monuments and parade grounds.

name: Arts Centre
description: Cultural hub featuring traditional crafts, art galleries, and performance spaces showcasing Ghanaian arts and culture.

name: Osu Castle
description: Historic castle that served as government headquarters, with a rich history dating back to the 17th century.
